mapper.select: SELECT MedRecord_id, Doctor_id, Patient_id, M_Time, M_State, M_Complaint, M_InspectResult, M_Diagnosis, M_Advice FROM medrecord

SELECT medrecord.MedRecord_id, FIRST.U_Name doctor, SECOND.U_Name patient, DATE_FORMAT(medrecord.M_Time,"%Y-%m-%d") M_Time, medrecord.M_State, medrecord.M_Complaint, medrecord.M_InspectResult, medrecord.M_Diagnosis, medrecord.M_Advice FROM medrecord,user FIRST,user SECOND where medrecord.Patient_id = #{id} AND FIRST.User_id=medrecord.Doctor_id AND SECOND.User_id=medrecord.Patient_id AND medrecord.M_State = "确认"
SELECT MedRecord_id, Doctor_id, Patient_id, M_Time, M_State, M_Complaint, M_InspectResult, M_Diagnosis, M_Advice FROM medrecord where medrecord.Doctor_id = #{id}

SELECT MedRecord_id, FIRST.U_Name doctor, SECOND.U_Name patient, DATE_FORMAT(medrecord.M_Time,"%Y-%m-%d") M_Time, M_State, M_Complaint, M_InspectResult, M_Diagnosis, M_Advice FROM medrecord,user FIRST,user SECOND where medrecord.Doctor_id = #{id} AND FIRST.User_id=medrecord.Doctor_id AND SECOND.User_id=medrecord.Patient_id AND medrecord.M_Time BETWEEN #{time_start} AND #{time_end} order by medrecord.M_Time DESC

SELECT MedRecord_id, FIRST.U_Name doctor, SECOND.U_Name patient, DATE_FORMAT(medrecord.M_Time,"%Y-%m-%d") M_Time, M_State, M_Complaint, M_InspectResult, M_Diagnosis, M_Advice FROM medrecord,user FIRST,user SECOND where medrecord.Doctor_id = #{id} AND FIRST.User_id=medrecord.Doctor_id AND SECOND.User_id=medrecord.Patient_id AND medrecord.M_Time BETWEEN #{time_start} AND #{time_end} AND medrecord.M_State = "保存" order by medrecord.M_Time DESC
mapper.insert: insert into medrecord (MedRecord_id, Doctor_id, Patient_id, M_Time, M_State,M_Complaint, M_InspectResult, M_Diagnosis,M_Advice) values (#{medRecord_id}, #{doctor_id}, #{patient_id}, #{m_Time}, #{m_State},#{m_Complaint}, #{m_InspectResult},#{m_Diagnosis}, #{m_Advice})
